title: Fed Official Does Politics While Inflation Soars
sub_head: Minneapolis Fed President Neel Kashkari receives a letter from the Senate.
body:
The decision by Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari to dismiss inflation concerns while engaging his bank in wholly inappropriate political activism is not looking better with time. As inflation continues to soar, Sen. Pat Toomey (R., Pa.), ranking member on the Senate banking committee, sends a letter this week to Mr. Kashkari:
Nearly a year ago, this column wrote:
